Joel__03.18__A fountain shall come forth of the h: : Viz., the fountain of grace in the church militant, and of glory in the church triumphant: which shall water the torrent or valley of thorns, that is, the souls that before, like barren ground brought forth nothing but thorns; or that were afflicted with the thorns of crosses and tribulations.
Joel__03.20__And Jerusalem: : That is, the spiritual Jerusalem, viz., the church of Christ.
